# rIMPD

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of rIMPD is to enable fast and easy exploration of publicly-available tree-ring fire history data in R

The package is under development, **please explore with caution**

## Installation

You can install the development version of rIMPD from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("chguiterman/rIMPD")
```

The package is not currently on CRAN.
